Text: üëçüèª
Good food and friendly staff
Fabulous

Recently, a wedding was held in this restaurant, choosing a banquet hall for 60 people. We were delighted, because the menu we chose turned out to be very tasty, the presentation was excellent, and the staff was always open to communication and discussing the details of the event. Also, the management of the institution gives almost complete freedom to organize and decorate your event as you wish. Also, speaking of weddings, there is an opportunity to hold an outdoor ceremony on a small but cozy green lawn near the restaurant.
I would like to especially thank Oleh and Oleksandra for their help in choosing the menu and advice on preparing for the holiday.

Tasty pizza ‚Äî perfect choice for all those, looking for the correct pizza Neapolitan style. Good bread and mix of Ingredients.

Text:
Adequate ordering via the Internet is already a big advantage, because in some establishments you still have to write to Viber and throw money inexplicably.

That's where the good stuff ends.
The rolls come with ordinary square tubs with no wasabi and dubious ginger.
They took the most expensive set, where they probably should have put the best rolls, only one turned out to be tasty - maki with shrimp. The roll covered with processed cheese is simply disgusting, the rest of the order is not good, it is also cut crookedly üíî

Just now I found out that sushi appeared in my apartment. I immediately decided to try it and regretted that I didn't know about them before. Everything is very tasty. The products are fresh, the portions are large. We didn't specify how many people to prepare the dishes for, we were given separate dishes, ginger and wasabi for each portion of rolls, which was especially pleasing. Definitely recommend
I ordered sushi - the rolls are fresh and tasty. Good quality packaging. I liked.

Sushi is big and very tasty, fast and cheap, not crowded. It was difficult to find a place, I went around the yards and then saw a pink sign on a pole, I attached a photo of the entrance, maybe it will help someone.
Very tasty sushi, I would especially recommend baked ones

The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.
Original Text: The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. Had to wait a long time for the food, and they didn't have enough regular size glasses for beers for us (we were about 15 people max). So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.
Original Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.

Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. Of course this is not a hipster fancy restaurant, but food is good, portions big, prices very pleasant. Average bill for two is around 400-500UAH (with drinks!) So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.
Original Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

Text:
The institution is not bad. But for us the disadvantages were‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ ordered borscht with some kind of baked bread - delicious, but the potatoes in the borscht were clearly undercooked
‚Ä¢ were in January - it was cold in the hall, you could put pillows on the wooden chairs
‚Ä¢ cooking time - from 20 to 30 minutes (

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Text:
It looks nice on photos and when walking past but it really doesn‚Äôt meet expectations.
The appetizer had sauces with bread and nothing fit together.

For the main corse we had ribs and salmon. The salmon was small and had nothing with it so we ordered potatoes. That was not made clear by the menu nor the waiter. It tasted good according to my gf but part of it was overcooked and hard.
The ribs were also a bit too hard where I had expected soft and tender meat. It was mediocre only.

We changed our minds and decided to get dessert elsewhere.

Text: Nice place. Good desserts

This is not the first time we visit this establishment, everything is always very tasty, beautiful, atmospheric! Cool presentation of dishes in beautiful dishes, nuggets and fries for children are served in a cool wooden plate in the shape of a hare. We visit the institution with children, on the second floor there is a spacious children's room with a pool with balls and a lot of other toys. The service and staff are friendly and always happy to help and advise. Among the minuses, it can be noted that it is difficult to find a free table during peak hours, and due to the large number of visitors, sometimes the children's room is a little overcrowded, but these are minor things)) I am glad that a decent establishment has finally appeared in this area!

A very cool institution. One of the best in the area. The service is good, the cuisine is very tasty. The facility itself is very comfortable and cozy, with a beautiful interior. I have been here more than once, I recommend it.
Tasty, clean, pleasant staff! Special praise for the children's room, which is always cleaned!
Great place, I recommend it!

Nice place for a quick breakfast. There is not much space inside, there are 2 tables for 3 people each. You can order takeaway pizza, pastries and drinks. There is a counter outside by the entrance. Prices for coffee and pastries are average. We ordered two coffees, a croissant and a cinnamon roll. It cost a little more than 100 hryvnias.
Very little space in the middle. They began to significantly raise the prices, although all the food and drinks are very tasty. I recommend!

A very pleasant and tasty place. At first glance, like an anthill. Everything and everyone is moving. But while you are standing in line and making a choice, you notice that everyone is in their place and the general noise does not interfere. Delicious and fresh dishes. Good coffee. While waiting in line at the Providence clinic, I managed to sit here and was pleasantly surprised. What a comfortable cafe - thanks to the friendly staff. Even in bad weather there is a good mood here. I want to expand. Because there will be little space in the hall in winter. good luck

The first time here and the last.
The staff does not know when what will be ready.
Microwave oven
it does not heat, but it can heat, but wait a long time. Don't have money for a regular microwave?
The pizzeria is fu and the staff is stupid

The best bakery ever. Fast and good service, a large assortment of always fresh pastries, aromatic coffee. In addition, the institution constantly delights with new seasonal offers and the promotion of the week. Fast serving of drinks and pizza, despite the large number of people, the queue is served very quickly. The staff is always friendly. It is possible to order delivery.
A place where you want to return again and again.

It is snowing outside. They called me and said that due to weather conditions, the delivery will be delayed a little, and I was very pleased when they warned me about it. But I was in for a pleasant shock when I opened my order and saw peanut cookies (which I didn't order) on which was written "sorry for the delay". I am a very sentimental person, and this was really very nice and unexpected for me.
You are the best and the service is top notch!
Thank you for such emotions!

I always stop by for a cup of hot coffee in the south-west. Always smiling employees bring a driving mood for the whole day. The service, unlike other establishments, is simply luxurious. The aroma of their pastries simply makes you want to visit this establishment every day

I have service experience in various bakery establishments. Fastest service in the Southwest. Friendly staff, and literally in 2-3 times they already recognize you as a regular customer and know your preferences. I order pizza by phone all the time, and the waiting time has never exceeded 30 minutes. Highly recommend!

6:01 p.m. in the evening, I went to the establishment to have a snack in the south-western district. The staff talked for a long time with some guys, not paying attention to other visitors who wanted to make an order. I believe that this is not at all competent in relation to customers and their superiors who had hope for these employees. The desire to visit this particular place disappeared. Please influence the future of your institution
I've always had good coffee, but today it's just terrible. First, it is cold, and secondly, it is sour ((The whole glass had to be thrown into the trash.
I bought a "meat boom" pizza today. Instead of ketchup, they put tomato paste, because of which it was sour and they skimped on meat, instead of fillet there was something with cartilage.

I bought a strudel today. Inside is absolutely raw dough!
How could you bake it and put it on the display?... I regret that I did not open and bite the pastry there, because I would have quickly returned it right there in the trash!!!
There are many wonderful bakeries in the city, I do not recommend this one, and I will not go there myself.
A very nice and cozy place with delicious cuisine!
As always, everything is delicious!
The most favorite bakery in the city, the pastries are the best in my opinion, I visit here often, maybe even every day

I bought a poppy seed cake two days in a row - delicious, lots of poppy seeds. I was not lucky today :( - it was hard and not very fresh... When I brought it back to the girls, they said that it just lay in the window all day and got weathered... I guess I won't test fate anymore and I won't come here. And the girls I advise you to warn customers "that it is from the window" or place it in a separate place with a discount (you have such)

It's a shame that the pizza boxes were opened at home. 4 pizzas were raw, one was put away, the others were forgotten, instead of pizza they sold me a shoti.
Not recommended.
In the last photo with the monitors, a 4-cheese pizza from another pizzeria is UAH 15 more expensive.

The coffee is terrible, the cheapest is robusta. The pies are beautiful on the outside, but inside there is only air, there is almost no dough or filling, a balloon. Cutlet in the dough - gentlemen owners, have you at least tasted it? The cheapest semi-finished products will probably not be so vile. I am ready to pay more for tasty and high-quality baked goods, or at least to buy a similar one again.

One gets the impression that the management needs funds, and everything else comes from a large mountain. There is no response even to the negative reviews written about this bakery, which confirms the above. As for the bakery itself, there are long queues, because instead of fast service at the cash register, there is a grind of laches. Create a network, create a service, then there will be high ratings

The pastries are delicious and fresh, but the staff leaves much to be desired.
I ordered a pizza, at first they told me to wait 25 minutes, then after a while they asked me to wait another 7 minutes, then they gave me a pizza whose dough was not fully baked. When I came to the store to tell about this, they didn‚Äôt even apologize to me. I advise you to give the girl a day off, because she constantly looks tortured, although this does not justify such an attitude.
And the pastries are good, especially burekas and croissants.
But I don‚Äôt recommend taking khachapuri - it‚Äôs a little dry and a little tasteless.

An excellent establishment with a wide range of products, pleasant and qualified staff. It is worth specially emphasizing that only today‚Äôs products are on the shelves, which distinguishes this establishment for the better from similar ones

The best pastries in town! The presence of two cash registers saves time, you do not stand in lines. The staff are just beads üòçüòçüòç. The presence of a shawarma station allows you to have breakfast before work. And in the evening I often take dessert and pizza home instead of dinner) I RECOMMEND TO EVERYONE!!!

They were waiting for their bus and wanted to eat. It is good that this establishment opens early. And the smell from the street tickled his nostrils. The choice fell on a pizza called "Super meat". Delicious dough, convenient serving in a box. Although for some reason they did not offer napkins. But that's a little thing. And the price for such a delicacy is quite democratic. Recommendation üëçüî•
Today we ordered an Americano pizza, somehow they forgot to add salami, everything was fine when we ordered before.

We ordered pesto pizza, 4 pieces of thin tomato for the whole pizza. Half a pizza without a tomato... But the pizza is delicious. Employees are not friendly, it is often necessary to repeat the order 3 times to finally issue it...

The last two visits to this bakery can be described in one word: "disappointment".
1) The order placed in advance (in 2.5 hours) and paid for is not ready, I have to wait another 45 minutes, I have not heard any apologies.
2) On 11/23/23 I bought a brownie that tasted like a not-so-fresh oatmeal cookie. I'm sorry, but a brownie shouldn't be rock hard.
It is possible that other people worked in this establishment for the first two months. If so, return them back.
Tasty and cheap)
Very tasty baked goods, I‚Äôve been going there almost every day since they opened and they‚Äôre always on the same level.

We were at Baker's today - we ordered pizza, uzvar (very tasty), sausage in dough - everything was delicious. But the child lost the collectible figure of Hello Kitty - Sailor. We sat near the cash register, where there is a small refrigerator. A big request, if suddenly someone from the staff (perhaps a cleaning lady) finds this toy - keep it with you, we will definitely come back for it. We visit you regularly. The child cried for her all the way home. Photo of a toy lost by a child.

A good chain of cafes where the food is always delicious and the prices are moderate. Each cafe has its own atmosphere and interior. The cafe on Blagovisnaya is the most interesting for me, because it has a cozy interior and a wide range of menus.
Thanks to the owners, Bakery has become a business card of Cherkasy.
On February 16, they bought "Pancakes with cream cheese, plum and meringue" There was a strong smell of onions from the pancakes, it felt like they were cooked in unwashed dishes after onions...

Everything is very tasty, always friendly staff (boys and girls smile even when they are tired). It is very crowded (because it is very tasty), the tables are usually occupied. That's why I always order with me.

The atmosphere, service, dishes are all great, like in a 5-star hotel.
I recommend it to all friends, acquaintances, immigrants who are now in Cherkasy.
This is my city since birth, the city of my 3 children. I thank the Lord for everything that the Lord gives me.
I recommend this institution even for all events.
Just super

Convenient location, small cafe. There are tables inside and outside, as for me the tables are very close to each other. The pastries are delicious, fresh, there are craft cheeses, spices for sale. I drank tea, it took a long time to prepare, but I was in no hurry, so everything is fine.
Good institution. Delicious sweet pastries and bread. Stylish interior. Clean and tidy.
Very cool. A very tasty baguette with cranberries and puff pastry with spinach.
The most delicious croissants and coffee are here! A place you want to return to... several times a day üòã
A wonderful establishment, wonderful friendly staff and very tasty croissantsüòç
Great hideout in the heart of the city Che. Very cozy, nice relaxed atmosphere, great selection of light morning food (sweets), outstanding coffee. Nice place to kick start a day.

Text: The best baked goods, meat, sweets and much more are here. The case when it is really difficult to leave the workshop with something. Yummy!!!

A good selection and very tasty baked goods, I have taken several times, every time I pass by, I try to run in for something tasty. Friendly staff.

Unfortunately, it was not possible to try all the positions, because everything quickly flies away

The tastiest buckwheat baguette in the world))) children love onion bread, and mom loves grain.
Very tasty hummus and falafel, profiteroles and strudel, Camembert cheese and mozzarella. Cool lemonade, aromatic coffee. And also marshmallows, cottage cheese in chocolate, deliciousness!
I would eat the whole store.
We are waiting when there will be bebusa and pilaf again.

I buy bread here almost every day. Previously, their bread was only delivered, then you could only buy it at the Cucumber store at customs. I know the founders personally and therefore I am confident in the quality. By the way, the bread here is the tastiest in the city. Ciabatta and onion soup are especially tasty. In addition, there are many local craft products on the counter. For example, we often take raclette cheese and mozzarella here.

I am glad that a store of craft products, created by the hands of Cherkassy residents and also from natural ingredients, has appeared in Cherkassy. Bread, cheeses, hummus, jam, marshmallows, ice cream. I recommend!

Very stylish Bakery, looks especially cool in the dark part of the day. Something similar to "American Classic" is cool, that there is a car wash nearby, while waiting for pizza, you can quickly wash your car

Friendly staff, fast delivery of orders - super service!

Came for the first time, took two pizzas for company. There are no comments on the service. There are many customers, there is not enough space inside. The tables are clean, the inside is also cleaned. The pizza is very average, the prices are accordingly affordable. OK A mother and a child were with us. It is very inconvenient that there is no ramp, it is not possible for a mother with a stroller to enter.
Everything took a long time, we waited for pizza - an hour, and coffee - 30 minutes, a long wait in line, the staff is very slow! I will not come here again.

Came here for the first time. Hello girls at the reception of orders. The room is spacious, there is a second hall of smaller size with a children's corner, it is almost visible, because there is not enough lighting in the passage. Traditional croissants for every taste. A coffee machine where you can prepare and pay for drinks yourself. Coffee for 4, very astringent and strong. Near the institution, the renovation of neighboring premises was noisy.

I like these establishments. Met in different cities. Everywhere is cozy and delicious.
Good atmosphere, lighting, service
